Title: Nisen-nengo no Kimi e: Shiganshina Kanraku (1)
Writer: Hajime Isayama (manga), Yasuko Kobayashi (screenplay), John Burgmeier (head writer), J. Michael Tatum (script writer)
Actors: Yuki Kaji, Yui Ishikawa, Marina Inoue, Hiroshi Tsuchida
Plot: For over a century, humans have been living in settlements surrounded by gigantic walls, which prevent the Titans, giant humanoid creatures who eat humans, from entering. Young Eren Yeager ...
